sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux" import { getPokeId } from "../../Components/Redux/Actions" import { useEffect } from "react" const Detail = (props)=>{ const dispatch = useDispatch() const pokemonId = props.match.params.idPokemon useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(getPokeId(pokemonId)) },[dispatch]) const idPoke = useSelector((state) => state.detail) return(
{pokemonID.length >= 1 ?
Nombre : {pokemonID[0].nombre.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + pokemonID[0].nombre.substring(1)}
ID : {pokemonID[0].id}
Tipo : {pokemonID[0].tipo.map(t => t.charAt(0).toUpperCase() + t.substring(1)).join(' - ')}
Vida: {pokemonID[0].vida}
Defensa: {pokemonID[0].defensa}
Ataque: {pokemonID[0].ataque}
Velocidad: {pokemonID[0].velocidad}
Altura: {pokemonID[0].altura}
Peso: {pokemonID[0].peso}
:
}
) } export default Detail;
